content: स्फाय् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (स्फायते, स्फीत) {@--1@} To grow large or fat, to become big or bulky. {@--2@} To swell, increase, expand; संदुधुक्षे तयोः कोपः पस्फाये शस्त्रलाघवं <ls>Bk. 14. 109.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (स्फावयति-ते) To cause to grow large, augment, increase; तावस्फावयतां शक्तीर्बाणांश्चाकिरतां मुहुः <ls>Bk. 17. 43</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">4. 33</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">12. 76</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">15. 99.</ls>
